data.title: Urho Konttori on LinkedIn: Breaking News
data.meta_description: Ability to have absolute coordinate system and tracking performance is key in every simulator use case out there. This is crucial collaboration and win-win-winâ€¦
data.text:
Strategic business partnerships are a key part of our success. We support display hardware companies such as #Varjo by creating new custom optical motion tracking targets and we work closely with software and middleware developers like #LP-Research so that they can create device drivers for our systems. Here's a great example of both: https://lnkd.in/dUjGDt_8 #AR-tracking, #varjo, #opticaltracking #virtualreality

Varjo Base 4.1 (Beta), intended only for early users of the new Varjo XR-4 Series, is now available for download. This release introduces improvements to inside-out tracking accuracy, passthrough performance, and more. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/dkwZ4x-K

Happy to be a guest on the webcast IT-byrÃ¥n together with Andrew Dyke from Meta and Sanna Grannas from Avoki, in an insightful discussion on 'devices go human' moderated by Camilla Stark. We talk about how technology is becoming more intuitive and seamless in our everyday lives, and what that means for both individuals and organizations. Of course, both XR and VR technologies as well as the advancements of AI are featured topics in the conversation. #techonology #XR #VR #AI

Video Offers a Glimpse of Vision Pro Hand-tracking & Occlusion Performance A video posted by a Vision Pro developer appears to show the current levels of hand-tracking and occlusion performance that Appleâ€™s new headset is capable of. Apple Vision Pro, expected to launch in the next few months, will use hand-tracking as its... https://lnkd.in/ekmPbNNs #AR #VR #Metaverse

OcuLenz restores the ability to read for people with central vision loss OcuLenz is an high-resolution AR headset that compensates for AMD vision issues to make it easier to read. The post OcuLenz restores the ability to read for people with central vision loss appeared first on MIXED Reality News.... https://lnkd.in/eUWUApxe #AR #VR #Metaverse

Whether for professional use or personal exploration, Teleport opens new possibilities for experiencing and interacting with our world in unprecedented ways. #VarjoTeleport #SpatialComputing #VirtualReality #XR #Innovation #FutureOfWork #DigitalTwin #TechRevolution #ImmersiveExperience ğ™‘ğ™ğ™™ğ™šğ™¤ ğ˜¾ğ™§ğ™šğ™™ğ™ğ™©ğ™¨: Varjo

Making cool visualizations isn't where the innovation lies... I've seen many an experimental prototype of dataviz in XR... but turning it into a PRODUCT with a full enterprise workflow: that is what makes it REAL. Using the Lenovo VRX and Qualcomm Snapdragon Spaces, I walk through the enterprise workflow using the Flow platform: the no-code Flow Editor, the back-end on-prem server, and the dataset API. #snapdragonspaces #vrx #lenovo #flowimmersive #datavisualization #ar

"The crisp screen is strikingâ€”in mixed-reality mode, you can easily read even small text, as on a receipt. Itâ€™s clear enough to make you feel like you have superhuman vision." Learn what Robb Report had to say about the Varjo XR-4 in this review: https://lnkd.in/dKkAwtfX
